name: Total Annihilation
description: This script will patch Total Annihilation in german
notes:
-download the patch file from: https://mega.nz/#!ZEcDBAJA!JcseiyMODIGK9uxYoEJ3-H--CHzKC-5pCMdWsKVTPDs
-Thanks to "Ionisator" from the GOG forum for the german patch
content:
files:
- patch: N/A:Please select the Patch file
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Total Annihilation/TotalA.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $patch
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Total Annihilation
    src: $CACHE/Deutschpatch
- task:
    key: Language
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Cavedog Entertainment\Total Annihilation
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: german
requires: total-annihilation-gog
